mapper.select: select * from dzjy where stock_id = #{stock_id} order by transaction_date DESC

select * from dzjy where transaction_date in
#{date}
select distinct transaction_date from dzjy Order by transaction_date DESC limit 0,30
select distinct transaction_date from dzjy where transaction_date > #{startdate} and transaction_date < #{enddate} Order by transaction_date DESC
select distinct transaction_date from dzjy Order by transaction_date DESC limit 0,10

select purchasing_department,sales_department,deal_num,deal_price,stock_name,stock_id from dzjy where transaction_date in
#{date}

select distinct sales_department from dzjy where transaction_date in
#{date}

select purchasing_department,sales_department,deal_num,deal_price,stock_name,stock_id from dzjy where transaction_date in
#{date}

select distinct purchasing_department from dzjy where transaction_date in
#{date}
select * from dzjy where purchasing_department like "%"#{departmentLike}"%" order by transaction_date desc limit 0,20
select * from dzjy where sales_department like "%"#{departmentLike}"%" order by transaction_date DESC limit 0,20
